Închiriază biciclete în Poiana Brașov la: Rent bikes in Poiana Brașov at the best prices. Discover the beauty of nature on two wheels!
Acest site folosește cookie-uri pentru a: This site uses cookies to enhance user experience.
about_line_1: We are a bunch of guys who ride together since the mid 90's, when our sport was still very young. We explored what was to explore, Postăvarul became our home. We were among the first to ride the trails that now everybody rides. An honor!
about_line_2: We grew since then. We became more. We became better. We opened a bike shop, we dug trails, we organized races, we opened new riding spots, we sponsored riders and teams and we made a project: the seed of what would become Bike Park Postăvarul. We worked on this mountain and we enjoyed it as we could. We left blood, sweat and tears here. And we always took others to ride with us, to show them what we have and how cool our mountain is and how good it is to be home. Because this is what a good host does.
about_line_3: Now we built a home up on the mountain, where we were at home anyway. We rent bikes, we offer guided tours and professional help and we always keep an open door for friends and friends to be. Because this is normal.
about_line_4: Things are moving forward, we stay the same. Come see us!
